technique: 8 second bloom swirl with 70g water. First 200g by 0:55 (13g/s, high, pushed until water pushed faster through bed), finish by 1:17 (7g/s) (overall 8.9g/s).

acidity.notes: Some fruit, but I'm also getting tangy (bitterness???)

sweetness.notes: Some definite creaminess. Fascinating minty flavor as I let it sit on my tongue.

finish.notes: Taste disappears fairly quickly, but tongue and mouth is a little tense. Tongue is slightly parched/dry. Is this sourness or astringency... or both?

actionItem: Possibly an uneven extraction. Try a high initial pour with a slower rate, closer to 8-10g/s (e.g. by 1:00).
